snippet: Streaming video from Netflix, HBO and other leading services will no longer count toward data limits under T-Mobile’s higher data plans.
abstract: T-Mobile exempts streaming video from Netflix, HBO and other leading services from data limits under some of its higher data plans.
lead_paragraph: Streaming video from Netflix, HBO and other leading services will no longer count toward data limits under T-Mobile’s higher data plans.

headline.print_headline: T-Mobile Exempts Some Video From Top Plans’ Data Limits
headline.main: T-Mobile Exempts Some Video From Some Plans’ Data Limits
